content:
I gave an online seminar about the Carleson project yesterday in the Homotopy type theory electronic seminar talks
The recording is here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vMEGU8fL1xM
My slides are here: https://florisvandoorn.com/talks/HoTTEST2024.pdf
There were some visual glitches during the recording, so it might be useful to open the slides next to it if you're watching the video.
Oh boy! What did the audience make of all of those integrals?
